ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( Release_Approved__c > TODAY(), Chatter_Now_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Dev_Mgr_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Dev_VP_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Development_Engineering_Signoff__c > TODAY(), FFX_Signoff__c > TODAY(), LiveAgent_Signoff__c > TODAY(), M_M_Signoff__c > TODAY(), OSC_Signoff__c > TODAY(), OSC_Exec_Signoff__c > TODAY(), PODSquad_PO_Signoff__c > TODAY(), QE_Mgr_Signoff__c > TODAY(), QE_VP_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Release_Management_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Release_Management_Exec_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Sandbox_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Search_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Sites_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Service_Delivery_TechOps_Signoff__c > TODAY(), TBR_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Technology_Exec_Signoff__c > TODAY(), Technology_Products_Operations_Signoff__c > TODAY(), TechOps_Eng_VP_Signoff__c > TODAY(), TechOps_Operations_Signoff__c > TODAY())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Signoff dates cannot be in the future.
